accordionIndicatorIcon.hint: The css class(es) used to get the icon displayed next to a collapseable group header. Usually just the glyph-identifying class is sufficient, defaults will be filled in automatically.
accordionIndicatorIcon.label: Accordion Indicator Icon

disabledClass.hint: The CSS class applied to reset-to-default buttons when their associated setting(s) is/are default.
disabledClass.label: Disabled Icon CSS Class

groupResetIcon.hint: Same as above, but for the Reset Group Settings button.
groupResetIcon.label: Group Reset Icon

moduleResetIcon.hint: Same as above, for the Reset Module Settings button's icon.
moduleResetIcon.label: Module Reset Icon

settingResetIcon.hint: Same as above, but for the per-setting reset buttons.
settingResetIcon.label: Setting Reset Icon

accordionSpeed.hint: The global speed at which animated collapsible groups transition
accordionSpeed.label: Animated Collapsible Group Speed
